description: The BlueRigger Mini DisplayPort to DVI female adapter cable is ideal for connecting Mini DisplayPort devices to your high definition monitor or display via the DVI (single-link) connector.Technical Specifications- Connection Type: mDP (Mini DisplayPort) to DVI Female- Supports Mini DisplayPort 1.2 input and DVI Female output- Supports DVI high definition resolutions, including 1080pCompatibility- MacBook, MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, iMac, Mac mini, Mac Pro with Mini DisplayPort- Computers, laptops, and tablets with Mini DisplayPortNote:Adapter only works with laptops with Mini Displayport, please check with your device's output specification prior to placing your order.Note:This cable is not sufficient to connect to a display by itself. You will need to use a DVI Male to Male cable to connect to your display.WarrantyBlueRigger cables are backed by a limited lifetime hardware warranty. Please contact us via email if you have any questions.
title: BlueRigger Mini DisplayPort (Thunderbolt) to DVI Female Adapter Cable
